name: You, Me, and the All-engulfing Sea
name_original: You, Me, and the All-engulfing Sea
description:
YOU, ME, AND THE ALL-ENGULFING SEA:

You, Me, and the All-engulfing Sea is a RPG-style room escape game, where the player finds themself locked in an abandoned house with no memories of the past. Through exploring the rooms, the tale of what happened in that house, as well as the identity of the player, begins to unravel. 

CONTROLS:

  • keyboard
  • action z
  • menu x
  • cancel x
